CommandsÂ¶

The articles in this section explain how to use all PetBlocks commands.

  • Commandslist
    • User Commands
      • /petblock
      • /petblock [gui-path]
      • /petblock call
      • /petblock toggle
      • /petblock rename <name>
      • /petblock skin <skin>
    • Admin Commands
      • /petblockreload
      • /petblocks [page]
      • /petblocks enable [player]
      • /petblocks disable [player]
      • /petblocks toggle [player]
      • /petblocks ai <path> [player]
      • /petblocks skin <path> [player]
      • /petblocks rename [player]
      • /petblocks togglesound [player]
      • /petblocks toggleparticle [player]
      • /petblocks inv <from> <to> [player]
      • /petblocks reset [player]
      • /petblocks debug [player]
      • /petblocks killnext
  • Rename Commands
